statements: DELETE FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution WHERE location = 'Beach' AND pollution_level > 50;
DELETE FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution WHERE location = 'beach' AND pollution_level > 5;
DELETE FROM impact_of_plastic_pollution WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
DELETE FROM pollution_data WHERE location = 'City A';
DELETE FROM marine_species WHERE threat_level = 'Critical' AND population_count < 1000;
DELETE FROM pollution_data WHERE location = 'River' AND pollution_level > 50.0;
DELETE FROM Pollution_Sources WHERE source_type = 'Industrial Waste';
DELETE FROM Marine_Life WHERE species = 'Turtle' AND population < 1000;
DELETE FROM research_team WHERE research_institution = 'Ocean Institute';
